attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the ipPort instance. The identifier is a combination of the ipPort identifier and the SP that contains the linked ports.

attributes.name: shortName
attributes.description: Short name of the ipPort, without the parent prefix.

attributes.name: linuxDeviceName
attributes.description: Name of the linux port device.

attributes.name: isLinkUp
attributes.description: Indicates whether the ipPort has link.

attributes.name: storageProcessor
attributes.description: Parent Storage Processor of the ipPort.
